short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy URLs and Titles from open tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CopyTabs© was designed to copy URLs & Titles from open tabs in their current window. By default, CopyTabs© will skip the first 3 tabs from the left,
then copy the URLs & Titles from the rest of the tabs,
closing each tab that has been copied. The above default settings can be changed on the Options page.

Click the "Copy Tabs" button below and see the magic in action!
Remember to paste what you've just copied ;)
